summary: After a trip to Thailand, a first-time drug mule finds himself in police custody, with his stomach crammed with narcotics. Now, he has to endure seven sphincter-clenching days to convince them of his innocence. Will nature take its course?
cast: Hugo Weaving|Angus Sampson|Leigh Whannell|Ewen Leslie|Geoff Morrell|Georgina Haig|Noni Hazlehurst|John Noble|Nick Farnell|Marney McQueen|Dave Lawson|Emma-Jane Newton|Alex Menglet|Ilya Altman|Brendan Bacon|Marsha Vassilevskaia|Jai Spence|James Kelly|Michael Rhodes|David Griffiths|Hayden Bellis|Adam Connolly|Adam Upton|Lasarus Ratuere|Shinichiro Ishikawa|Cameron Cairnes|Colin Cairnes|Shaun Grant|Sombart Chamclan|Chor Huat 'Billy' Loh|Ri-Jie Kwok|Jim Daly|Winston|Alistair Flower|Satvinder Singh Gandhi|Peter Knowles|Richard Davies|Fletcher Humphrys|Chris Pang|Tim Bone|Camilo Salgado|Simon King|Angus Coupland|Tim Robertson|Glenn Arrowsmith|Adrian Goodwin|Cindy Waddingham|Matt Carter|Sylvie de Crespigny|Tamzen Hayes|Sima Tsyskin|James Ashton|Grant Piro|Gavin Wood|Emma Bortignon|Ian Neil|David Argue|Shawn Cosgrove|Kellie Sloane|Alexandra Paterson|Sofia Toumbas
title: The Mule
